title: Kismet Doner and Frites
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, International, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers several vegan choices and are continually adding more, including falafel wrap with in-house-made tzatziki, Turkish pizza, and an eggplant dish. Centrally located in the pedestrian zone. All desserts are made with plant-based margarine.
